name: Scent of Sorrow 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Play as a dog named Lula, waking up lost in an eerie forest. Use your keen sense of smell to explore the environment where fragments of your memory will help you unveil your past. This heartfelt narrative adventure is a new take on the theme of animal abandonment. 

Platform: PC 
Engine: Unity 
Number of player: 1

Linkedin : https://www.linkedin.com/company/scent-of-sorrow/ 

Producer : Vincent DUVENOU, Mourad OUESLATI
Game Art : Tom FAVIER, Laura MICHEL, Matthis CHENET, Sabrina SCHULLER
Game Design : Paul RICHARTE
Game Design & Programming : Alexis PERRAULT, Arthur RAFFAUD, Alexandre RAUMEL
Game Programming : Judicaël CHARLOT, Valentin GUILLEMOT
Music & Sound Design : Adrien DAUTEL, Thilo GOLUZA
